page.title: 02LILLESHALL CANALS
page.content: The canal was once used to carry coal to limekilns in{Lilleshall}and swap it for lime which was taken to {Coalbrookdale.}The canal in our block is called the{Donnington Wood}canal because it starts in{Donnington Wood and ends in{Pave Lane.}This canal was eventually closed on Christmas Day 1882. The people who make the boats closed in February{1765 }the boats are really called tub boats and the canal was quite shallow because the tub boats have flat bottoms instead of pointed bottoms so they don't need very deep water to float on.
